After watching two seasons of HANNIBAL, I think a new license plate motto is in order: MARYLAND, HOME OF EXOTIC MURDER SCENES.

— Stephen King (@StephenKing) May 20, 2014

either tv guide is wrong or i was grossly misinformed about hannibal pic.twitter.com/gOfTwgglTv

— pilot (@pilotbacon) May 19, 2014

Sunday-night television certainly happened! Characters did things, and I have feelings about that.

— Every Tweet Ever (@EveryTweet_Ever) May 19, 2014

This NYU graduation is putting tweets on the big screens. Nothing could possibly go wrong here. *Mr. Burns hands* EXCELLENT.

— K.M. McFarland (@km_mcfarland) May 19, 2014

The winning horse from the Kentucky Derby will be allowed to wear a nasal strip. Those races are so dull even the horses are snoring

— Eliza Bayne (@ElizaBayne) May 19, 2014

Eventually "Halt and Catch Fire" and "Silicon Valley" will have to answer the question: Are computers interesting?

— Margaret Lyons (@margeincharge) May 19, 2014

@margeincharge "...but can it LOVE?"

— James Poniewozik (@poniewozik) May 19, 2014

Halt and Catch Fire is struggling to make me believe building a computer in your garage is sexy and dangerous.

— Claire (@musi215) May 20, 2014

And honestly, @AMC_TV, if you can't make me believe something involving Lee Pace is sexy, you have a problem.

— Claire (@musi215) May 20, 2014

Remember on Seinfeld when Jerry said he dreamt a hamburger was eating him? pic.twitter.com/LEtwMqwAyn

— Poe Daar-meron (@AndrewDaar) May 20, 2014

"Man, Truman is so lucky." -Generation Y watching 'The Truman Show'

— Aaron Fullerton (@AaronFullerton) May 20, 2014

Fire cannot harm a dragon, and hopefully neither can the herpes Daario Naharis is DEFINITELY carrying.

— Sean Thomason (@TheThomason) May 20, 2014

This week's Game of Thrones revealed a problem I hadn't recognized in the books: Apparently a lot of people find it hard to say "Arya."

— June Thomas (@junethomas) May 20, 2014

The should just call it Arya of Thrones and have it just be about Arya and everyone else is just always talking about how awesome Arya is.

— Marvel's Infinity Waco (@johnwarrender) May 20, 2014

"No, he is an evil character. He needs a very evil brooch!" -- the wardrobe person on "Game of Thrones."

— Chris Regan (@ChrisRRegan) May 20, 2014

With Letterman retiring, I feel bad for the guy who runs across the stage at the top of each show. How‚Äôs that work on the resume?

— David J. Loehr (@dloehr) May 20, 2014

‚Äú2012-2015: ran across stage to make people think I was Dave.‚Äù

— David J. Loehr (@dloehr) May 20, 2014

‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry, Bill, but Mr. Colbert isn‚Äôt going to be doing a ‚Äòfake Colbert running across the stage‚Äô bit.‚Äù

‚ÄúWhat, he does his own running?‚Äù

— David J. Loehr (@dloehr) May 20, 2014

Disappointing WSJ piece this AM on big law firm merger: has no mention of Florrick-Agoos/Lockhart-Gardner? Shocking oversight. @calibadger

— Ben Grossman (@grossman) May 19, 2014

"I just might quit & go to New Zealand" If it means you could be best friends with Lucy Lawless, then yes, Diane. Buy a ticket. #TheGoodWife

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

I need a ring tone of Julianna Margulies laughing.

— MZS (@mattzollerseitz) May 19, 2014

Christine Baranski's laughter is truly one of the loveliest sounds in all of existence. That is all. #TheGoodWife

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

#TheGoodWife: still doing onscreen sex and eroticism better than any cable show ever could.

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

The three things I like are beer, Mexican food and arguing about whether Mad Men or The Good Wife is the deeper show.

— Emily Nussbaum (@emilynussbaum) May 20, 2014

The thing about Riot is I saw a commercial a couple weeks ago, said "That looks terrible," and promptly set a series recording.

— Zach üö∑ (@zhaldeman) May 20, 2014

Pretty sure teen wolf season 4 premieres during exam week, can't believe MTV didn't consult with the university before setting the date.

— Sophie üåπ (@insopherable) May 20, 2014

My #DWTS finale dance would include a sprinkler and consuming an entire bag of Doritos in a crop top.

— Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) May 20, 2014

Sure, marriage equality in yet *another* state, but the gay mafia will have been created for naught if the Maya Rudolph Show fails tonight.

— itsonlyzach (@itsonlyzach) May 19, 2014

If anyone says anything bad about this show I will virtually kick you in the neck like Solange did Jay in that elevator #TheMayaRudolphShow

— Tara L. Conley, Ed.D (@taralconley) May 20, 2014

safe to say this nuts-clams-cameltoes sketch would never have made it on Donny and Marie or Mandrell Sisters #TheMayaRudolphShow

— Brian Steinberg (@bristei) May 20, 2014

Well, it's official. I'm definitely going to have "Dee's Nuts" stuck in my head for days. #TheMayaRudolphShow

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

I think I would like the Maya Rudolph Show better if I liked Fred Armisen and Sean Hayes.

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) May 20, 2014

Whoops, Janelle Monae is performing, never mind this is the best.

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) May 20, 2014

On the plus side...Colin Jost is nowhere in sight. #TheMayaRudolphShow

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

"What if the SNL audience were about 60% more obnoxious sounding?" - The Maya Rudolph Show producers, apparently.

— Myles McNutt (@Memles) May 20, 2014

So we're all going to switch off #TheMayaRudolphShow at 10:30 & watch #TheBoondocks, right? Right?! (crickets fighting the urge to laugh)

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

When the 4th season ends can we just pretend like it never happened?#TheBoondocks

— Moody Foodie (@ez_there) May 20, 2014

My only real context with Ellen Burstyn is 'Requiem for a Dream' so I'm really worried for her in this apartment right now. #Louie

— Anthony Dean-Harris (@i_ADH) May 20, 2014

For the record, Jane is a undisciplined future psycho #Louie

— Tone Bee (@TeeliciousB) May 20, 2014

Can Jane be my Spirit guide? #Louie

— Cait Malone (@SpaceCaits) May 20, 2014

Wish all my fellow educators are watching #Louie tonight. In one scene a little girl outlines everything wrong with education.

— David Bulley (@DavidBulley) May 20, 2014

#Louie is the best, most romantic look at New York since [insert Woody Allen film that takes place in New York here].

— Michael O'Brien (@MikeOBry) May 20, 2014

Unfortunate I used up all my cringes last night during #MadMen, because dear God #Louie the awkward never stops does it? #ElevatorPart3

— Whitney McIntosh (@WhitneyM02) May 20, 2014

A man with a three-legged dog is giving #Louie the glorified version of a "First World Problems" speech and dropping the mic afterwards.

— Whitney McIntosh (@WhitneyM02) May 20, 2014

Juuust a thought: if @louisck reappeared suddenly on Parks and Rec this season and made a comment about Champion...I mean PLEASEEEE.

— Whitney McIntosh (@WhitneyM02) May 20, 2014

"Honest question: when you wrote this, were you smoking a jazz cigarette?" - How I'll ask people if they're nuts henceforth. #TheGoldbergs

— Melissa Mann (@PhantomRat) May 20, 2014

Chloe been putting bosses in check, hard, since Season 3. #24LAD

— Dexter Goad (@ShadowDogProd) May 20, 2014

I'd give #24LAD every bonus point in all of existence if William Devane was sporting his hook from ROLLING THUNDER for no explicable reason.

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

That look you see in Audrey's eyes, Mark, is your wife slipping away from you at warp speed as soon as she heard Jack Bauer's name. #24LAD

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

Seriously, it‚Äôs been 8+ seasons. ALWAYS LISTEN TO JACK. #24LAD

— Bah, Handlen! (@zhandlen) May 20, 2014

"I'm sorry, I couldn't hear you second-guessing my orders over the sound of you stroking yourself because of your crush on Kate." #24LAD

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

"Why the hell should I trust you?" "Because I have second billing over Chloe in the credits, for some reason. That's why." #24LAD

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) May 20, 2014

tweets.html:
Hasn't been an hour in which we haven't been reminded that Kate "didn't even know about her husband." WE GET IT! A WOMAN MESSED UP! #24LAD

— cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future (@sarCCastro) May 20, 2014

The folks @BacheloretteABC are airing the #bachelorette premiere as late as possible to ensure that these guys haunt all our dreams.

— Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) May 20, 2014

my strategy in a reality competition dating show would be to become friends with the women and convince them to all help kill the guy

— pilot (@pilotbacon) May 19, 2014

Time to rock out with your biological clock out! It's #Bachelorette time!

— Jill Biden (@JillBidenVeep) May 20, 2014

"I don't know what I did to deserve 25 men to fly across the country and meet me!" You all said you'd make out on TV? #Bachelorette

— B Haynes (@barbhaynes) May 20, 2014

This is literally my face when 90% of the guys step out of the limo... #Bachelorette pic.twitter.com/evKOOUPZAJ

— B Haynes (@barbhaynes) May 20, 2014

God, I wish this show was on Wednesday so I could make a terrible 25 guys/hump day joke. Stupid Monday.

— LaToya Ferguson (@lafergs) May 20, 2014

Andi pulls her diploma from the wall and heads off to find love on reality TV and I weep for America and fear for my daughters.#bachelorette

— Jennifer Weiner (@jenniferweiner) May 20, 2014

DID HE SAY HIS NAME IS ANAL? #Bachelorette

— Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) May 20, 2014

Emil says, "It's Anal with an M." "I will never forget that," says Andi, who is scarred for life. Brett has a lamp. #bachelorette

— Jennifer Weiner (@jenniferweiner) May 20, 2014

"I love lamp," - Brett #bachelorette

— Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) May 20, 2014

Most appropriate Bachelorette close-caption ‚Äú[Indistinct Talking]"

— Chris(tmas name) (@djgristle) May 20, 2014

Tell me I'm not alone in hoping Andi keeps Anal around for a few weeks. #Bachelorette

— Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) May 20, 2014

I would totally give the First Impression Rose to the guy whose hair horrified me the most. #Bachelorette

— B Haynes (@barbhaynes) May 20, 2014

Andi eats a cookie. Somewhere Juan Pablo is shaking his head in disapproval. #Bachelorette

— Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) May 20, 2014

How is she telling anyone apart? Gay Guy. Gay Guy #2. Black Guy. Surfer Dude. Prince Farquaad. American Psychos 1~20. #Bachelorette

— B Haynes (@barbhaynes) May 20, 2014

Commercials! Here is something you can take for painful intercourse during menopause. Please God let my kids be asleep. #Bachelorette

— Jennifer Weiner (@jenniferweiner) May 20, 2014

Pantstrawhatnow? #TheBachelorette

— tv observatory (@tvobservatory) May 20, 2014

"Gentlemen, if you did not receive a rose, take a moment... and GET A DAMN HAIRCUT. Seriously, Jason." #AndisInnerMonologue #TheBachelorette

— Kristen Baldwin (@KristenGBaldwin) May 20, 2014

Men rejected by #Bachelorette are edited to appear mildly disappointed, annoyed or mad. Dumped #Bachelor women are framed as 100% devastated

— Jennifer L. Pozner (@jennpozner) May 20, 2014
